turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you know what Save the Children is?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have heard about it. What do you know about it?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an organization that helps children in developing countries, by promoting children's rights and providing relief. I think they help pay for their education and other necessities.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do you have any experince dealing with them at all?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I personally haven't ever dealt with them, I have just seen a lot of commercials and heard about the organization for many years.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have heard that they work hard to give kids a better life.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, I have heard that about them too. I have thought about donating before, but never got around to it. Would you be willing to donate some, or all, of your payment from this task to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I think I would be will to donate to the cause.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I think I would be willing to as well. It appears that there is an option to donate some of your earnings, and the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children :)

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh that is really a great idea. I think I would be able to donate some of my earnings. Would $1 help at all?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That sounds great! I'm guessing you would input your donation amount at the end of the task.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would be glad to. How much are you giving?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm going to give $1 as well :)

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Well that is really great. It sounds like a great charity. I think they might even help in Hawaii with the recent floods, don't you think? I bet the kids there are in need.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yeah, I think they are doing some really important work! I'm not sure exactly how the donations they get are distributed and if it only goes to developing countries, or also to disaster relief.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I'm not sure either, but it just kills me to know there are ids suffering. How do you feel?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I feel the same. It makes me so sad to know that some children are having a hard time even finding clean water to drink. I think it's important for those of us in a first world country to help, but it's also so easy to overlook these things. I know I have.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, sometimes I feel a little guilty that I have it so easy. I can not imagine food or clothing being a luxury. Can you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I can't imagine that either. Those are things I've just always had, so sometimes I feel guilty that I haven't tried to do more to help others.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, it really does cause feelings of guilt!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I completely agree! It's not that we don't all have our own struggles, but it's just on a completely different level.
